elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Answer the questions below for the selected picture from subtask a).

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Think about the style in which this picture was painted (close to nature, changing nature, abstract). Use the "What is art?" tool as a guide:

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Use the "View and evaluate images" tool to look at your work: first go through all the steps in the tool and make notes in keywords:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Put your notes into a coherent, coherent form. To do this, use the phrases from the "Talking and writing about works" tool:
